DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy small colorectal polyp removal use cold endoscopic mucosal resection hot endoscopic mucosal resection . Half participant receive cold endoscopic mucosal resection , half receive hot endoscopic mucosal resection .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Small Colorectal Polyp Removal Using Cold EMR With Hot EMR
DOC.detailed_description: Colorectal polyp consider precancerous lesion endoscopical resection currently treatment choice possible . Colorectal polyp classify diminutive polyp ( < 5mm diameter ) , small polyp ( 6-9mm diameter ) , large polyp ( > 1cm diameter ) . There several endoscopical treatment method : cold biopsy forceps polypectomy , cold snare polypectomy , hot biopsy forceps polypectomy , hot snare polypectomy , endoscopic mucosal resection . Cold polypectomy mean mechanical removal polyp snare biopsy forceps without use electrocautery , hot polypectomy mean removal polyp use electocautery .
DOC.criteria: Patients colorectal polyp < 1cm diameter need endoscopic mucosal resection . Patients give inform consent study . Patients age 19 Patients receive antiplatelet anticoagulant therapy Patients hypercoagulability ( i.e. , liver cirrhosis , hemophilia , endstage renal disease , chronic kidney disease )
